includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: Ron Perlman and Charlie Hunnam lead a ragtag band of bikers into a conflict with a rival motorcycle club in Kurt Sutter's award-winning crime drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ron Perlman and Charlie Hunnam lead a ragtag band of bikers into a conflict with a rival motorcycle club in Kurt Sutter's award-winning crime drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ron Perlman and Charlie Hunnam lead a ragtag band of bikers into a conflict with a rival motorcycle club in Kurt Sutter's award-winning crime drama.
includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, mature themes, sex, violence

includedAssets.title: Seeds
includedAssets.synopsis: As the club deals with the aftermath of its illegal arms warehouse attack, the deputy chief of police poses a new threat to SAMCRO's reign over Charming.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The club deals with the aftermath of its illegal arms warehouse attack.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the club deals with the aftermath of its illegal arms warehouse attack, the deputy chief of police poses a new threat to SAMCRO's reign over Charming.

includedAssets.title: Fun Town
includedAssets.synopsis: When the young daughter of a prominent Charming family is assaulted during a visiting carnival, SAMCRO is determined to deliver its own brand of justice.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The young daughter of a prominent Charming family is assaulted during a visiting carnival.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When the young daughter of a prominent Charming family is assaulted during a visiting carnival, SAMCRO is determined to deliver its own brand of justice.

includedAssets.title: Patch Over
includedAssets.synopsis: The Sons travel to Nevada to store arms with a brother club. But Tara's ex, ATF agent Kohn, begins investigating SAMCRO.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Sons travel to Nevada to store arms with a brother club. But Tara's ex, ATF agent Kohn, begins investigating SAMCRO.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Sons travel to Nevada to store arms with a brother club. But Tara's ex, ATF agent Kohn, begins investigating SAMCRO.

includedAssets.title: Giving Back
includedAssets.synopsis: Gemma hosts a fundraiser, which brings a former club member, who was responsible for Opie's arrest, back to town.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Gemma hosts a fundraiser, which brings a former club member, who was responsible for Opie's arrest, back to town.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Gemma hosts a fundraiser, which brings a former club member, who was responsible for Opie's arrest, back to town.

includedAssets.title: AK-51
includedAssets.synopsis: A small favour for Piney's old war buddy turns into a big problem for SAMCRO. With Clay detained, it falls to Jax to handle the situation.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A small favour for Piney's old war buddy turns into a big problem for SAMCRO. With Clay detained, it falls to Jax to handle the situation.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A small favour for Piney's old war buddy turns into a big problem for SAMCRO. With Clay detained, it falls to Jax to handle the situation.

includedAssets.title: Old Bones
includedAssets.synopsis: When human remains are discovered on the outskirts of Charming, Clay is forced to deal with secrets he buried long ago. Meanwhile, Kohn's investigation turns personal.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When human remains are discovered on the outskirts of Charming, Clay is forced to deal with secrets he buried long ago.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When human remains are discovered on the outskirts of Charming, Clay is forced to deal with secrets he buried long ago. Meanwhile, Kohn's investigation turns personal.

includedAssets.title: The Pull
includedAssets.synopsis: With the IRA gun payment looming, SAMCRO scrambles to come up with the cash. Meanwhile, Jax finds himself in a dangerous position with Tara.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With the IRA gun payment looming, SAMCRO scrambles to come up with the cash.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With the IRA gun payment looming, SAMCRO scrambles to come up with the cash. Meanwhile, Jax finds himself in a dangerous position with Tara.

includedAssets.title: Hell Followed
includedAssets.synopsis: SAMCRO plans to retaliate against a rival biker club, while Jax, Bobby and Opie aim to put an end to the gun debt for good.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: SAMCRO plans to retaliate against a rival biker club, while Jax, Bobby and Opie aim to put an end to the gun debt for good.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: SAMCRO plans to retaliate against a rival biker club, while Jax, Bobby and Opie aim to put an end to the gun debt for good.

includedAssets.title: Better Half
includedAssets.synopsis: With ATF agent Stahl pressing the women of SAMCRO, Jax sees Chief Unser as the key to the club's survival.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With ATF agent Stahl pressing the women of SAMCRO, Jax sees Chief Unser as the key to the club's survival.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With ATF agent Stahl pressing the women of SAMCRO, Jax sees Chief Unser as the key to the club's survival.

includedAssets.title: Capybara
includedAssets.synopsis: When one SAMCRO member is arrested for murder and another goes missing, Jax must choose between friendship and the club.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When one SAMCRO member is arrested for murder and another goes missing, Jax must choose between friendship and the club.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When one SAMCRO member is arrested for murder and another goes missing, Jax must choose between friendship and the club.

includedAssets.title: The Sleep of Babies
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep12 - The Sleep of Babies
includedAssets.synopsis: In need of cash to fund Bobby's defence, Clay's solution leaves SAMCRO in a vulnerable position.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In need of cash to fund Bobby's defence, Clay's solution leaves SAMCRO in a vulnerable position.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In need of cash to fund Bobby's defence, Clay's solution leaves SAMCRO in a vulnerable position.

includedAssets.title: The Revelator
includedAssets.synopsis: In the wake of a great tragedy, the club must re-evaluate their bonds of brotherhood. Last in series.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In the wake of a great tragedy, the club must re-evaluate their bonds of brotherhood. Last in series.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Ron Perlman and Charlie Hunnam lead a ragtag band of bikers in Kurt Sutter's award-winning crime drama. In season one, outlaw motorcycle club SAMCRO battles both drug dealers and law enforcement as it attempts to protect its quiet hometown of Charming, California.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Outlaw motorcycle club SAMCRO battles both drug dealers and law enforcement as it attempts to protect its quiet hometown of Charming, California.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ron Perlman and Charlie Hunnam lead a ragtag band of bikers in Kurt Sutter's award-winning crime drama. In season one, outlaw motorcycle club SAMCRO battles both drug dealers and law enforcement as it attempts to protect its quiet hometown of Charming, California.

includedIn.title: Sons Of Anarchy
includedIn.synopsis: Ron Perlman, Charlie Hunnam and Katey Sagal star in this award-winning US crime drama which follows a ragtag band of bikers in the quiet town of Charming, California. Hunnam plays Jax, the vice president of SAMCRO, an outlaw motorcycle club who battle both drug dealers and law enforcement in an attempt to protect their hometown. Jax, however, begins to grow concerned with the violent direction the club is taking…
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Top crime drama which follows an outlaw motorcycle club who battle both drug dealers and law enforcement in an attempt to protect their hometown.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Ron Perlman, Charlie Hunnam and Katey Sagal star in this award-winning US crime drama which follows a ragtag band of bikers in the quiet town of Charming, California. Hunnam plays Jax, the vice president of SAMCRO, an outlaw motorcycle club who battle both drug dealers and law enforcement in an attempt to protect their hometown. Jax, however, begins to grow concerned with the violent direction the club is taking…
